external_references.source_name: Cisco Talos MUSTANG PANDA PLUGX PUBLOAD MAY 2022
external_references.description: Asheer Malhotra, Jungsoo An, Kendall Mc. (2022, May 5). Mustang Panda deploys a new wave of malware targeting Europe. Retrieved August 4, 2025.
EclecticIQ Threat Research Team. (2023, February 2). Mustang Panda APT Group Uses European Commission-Themed Lure to Deliver PlugX Malware. Retrieved September 9, 2025.

objects.description: [PlugX](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0013) has leveraged an initial executable disguised as a legitimate document to trick the target into opening it.(Citation: Cisco Talos MUSTANG PANDA PLUGX PUBLOAD MAY 2022)(Citation: EclecticIQ Mustang Panda PlugX)
